landing.metaTitle: MaketuShop - Modern marketplace to buy and sell locally
landing.heroTitle: Sell and buy locally with a premium experience.
landing.heroSubtitle: MaketuShop helps sellers launch their online shop and customers discover quality products quickly.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Modern tools to boost sales and build customer trust.
landing.howSubtitle: Get started in a few simple steps.
landing.categoriesSubtitle: Quickly explore what your customers are looking for.
landing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know to get started quickly.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join a platform designed to convert visitors into loyal customers.
landing.splitCustomerText: Discover verified sellers and order with confidence.
landing.splitSellerText: Create your shop, publish your products, and grow your business.
landing.newsletterText: Receive our best offers, seller tips, and market trends.
landing.newsletterInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
landing.newsletterSuccess: Thanks! You are subscribed to the newsletter.
landing.footerTagline: The local marketplace connecting customers and sellers with confidence.
landing.feature1Description: Publish and quickly find thousands of products.
landing.feature2Description: Clear order tracking and optimized delivery time.
landing.feature4Description: Each seller can showcase their brand and offers.
landing.feature6Description: Advanced filters to quickly find the right product.
landing.step1Description: Sign up in seconds as a buyer or seller.
landing.step2Description: Browse categories or publish your products online.
landing.step3Description: Leverage social proof and tracking tools.
landing.faq1Question: How do I create an account?
landing.faq1Answer: Click "Create account", choose your profile, and complete the form.
landing.faq2Question: How do I become a seller?
landing.faq2Answer: After registration, activate your supplier area and create your shop.
landing.faq3Answer: Yes, the platform applies high security standards.
landing.faq4Answer: Yes, each order has clear tracking in your space.
landing.faq5Answer: No, fees are transparent and displayed before validation.
landing.faq6Answer: Yes, our support team is available to help you.

aboutPage.title: MaketuShop, the showcase for online business in Cameroon
aboutPage.intro: MaketuShop is an e-commerce platform designed to help Cameroonian entrepreneurs sell online, structure their business, and reach more customers with simple, modern, and accessible tools.
aboutPage.missionText: Digitize local commerce and make it easier for sellers and customers to connect across Cameroon.
aboutPage.visionText: Build a trusted ecosystem to sustainably grow Cameroon's online business.
aboutPage.impactText: Give more visibility to local shops and create new growth opportunities.
aboutPage.authorBio1: Young Cameroonian entrepreneur and software engineer, initiator and owner of MaketuShop.
aboutPage.authorBio2: His approach is to provide useful, practical digital solutions adapted to local realities to accelerate local commerce transformation.

contactPage.title: Contact MaketuShop
contactPage.intro: Find all official communication channels to reach the MaketuShop team.
